headline: Riga, Tallinn and Vilnius: Launching three new European Cloudflare data centers
keywords: March of Cloudflare, Cloudflare Network, Data Center
description: Cloudflare announces the turn up of our newest data centers located in Riga (Latvia), Tallinn (Estonia) and Vilnius (Lithuania). They represent the 140th, 141st and 142nd cities across our growing global network, and our 37th, 38th, and 39th cities in Europe.
